name: FORVIN
description:
FORVIN is a short story about Cynth, a college student investigating her mother's disappearance. She suspects the cosmetic company FORVIN is involved.

Length: ~10-30 minutes depending on how much you explore!

I hope you enjoy it, thank you for supporting me!

The game is FREE and donations are NOT NECESSARY! 

If you decide to donate, thank you so much!! It's greatly appreciated :)

FORVIN was made using Gamemaker Studio 1 and I look forward to releasing future projects ^-^
